articles.title: Kumbh Mela: At least 12 feared dead in crush at huge Indian religious festival - BBC.com
articles.description: Eyewitnesses and hospital sources have told the BBC that they have seen at least a dozen bodies.
articles.content:
Crowd crushes are tragically frequent in India, often leading to loss of lives. 
Just this month, six people died in a crush at one of India's wealthiest temples in town of Tirupati insouthern Andhr… [+1428 chars]
